00022 
00023         void MPathCommandParser::parse(Path *path, char command,
00024                 PathDataParser *dataParser, const vector<float> &arguments)
00025                 const
00026         {
00027             Vector2D translation(arguments[0], arguments[1]);
00028             translation = dataParser->toAbsoluteSpace(command, translation);
00029 
00030             dataParser->setStartingPoint(translation);
00031             dataParser->setCurrentPoint(translation);
00032             dataParser->setLastControlPoint(translation);
00033 
00034             PathComponent *component = new PathComponent(path);
00035             path->addComponent(component);
00036             dataParser->setCurrentComponent(component);
00037 
00038             /* TODO: other arguments should be treated as implicit
00039              * L commands. */
00040         }
00041     }
00042 }
